timeline.message: fix google map labels on top of offline layers

timeline.bodyText: Generally we should avoid using comments. Comments should be used if it's a tricky case that requires an explanation. In 99% cases you can just come up with a better method name. In this case it would be for example setLabelsVisibility(); ahh and we don't use _ in method names.
